Package com.example.cs309android.util.security

Class Hasher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.cs309android.util.security.Hasher
  • public class Hasher
extends java.lang.Object
    Static utility class designed to streamline the secure generation of hashes from plaintext passwords.
    Author:
    Mitch Hudson

                          byte[] slt)
        Hashes the given password and salt with PBEKeySpec
        Parameters:
        plaintext - Password to hash
        slt - Randomly generated salt to use for hash
        Returns:
        byte[] of salted hashed password
